title: Knights of the Old Republic
description:
Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic (Mac)

  This includes the "Universal Binary for Intel Macs" folder on it also. 

To Install This Update
- You first need to install the full Knights of the Old Republic game by dragging the "Knights of the Old Republic" folder from your game DVD to your computer's hard drive. You can place it anywhere on your hard drive.
- Now open the "Universal Binary for Intel Macs" folder on the game DVD and drag the "Knights of the Old Republic" game icon into the game folder on your hard drive. You will be asked to confirm replacing the old game with the new one.
